00019 #include <vector>
00020 #include <numeric>
00021 #include <boost/foreach.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/format.hpp>
00023 #include <boost/property_tree/ptree.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/filesystem/operations.hpp>
00025 #include "sdr/perseus/perseus_control.hpp"
00026 #include "sdr/perseus/fx2_control.hpp"
00027 #include "sdr/perseus/input_queue.hpp"
00028 
00029 namespace Perseus {
00030   class receiver_control_impl : public receiver_control {
00031   public:
00032     enum {
00033       _vendor_id  = 0x04B4,
00034       _product_id = 0x325C
00035     } ;
00036 
00037     // map: sample rate -> filename
00038     typedef std::map<int, std::string> rbs_map;
00039 
00040     receiver_control_impl(size_t index)
00041     : _fx2_control(fx2_control::make(_vendor_id, _product_id, index))
00042     , _frontend_ctl(0xFF)
00043     , _use_preselector(false)
00044     , _filter_cutoffs(make_filter_cutoffs())
00045     , _sample_rate(-1) {
00046       if (_poll_libusb_thread == 0) {
00047         _poll_libusb_refcount = 1;
00048         ASSERT_THROW(pthread_create(&_poll_libusb_thread, NULL, 
00049                                     &poll_libusb_thread_fn, NULL) == 0);
00050       } else {
00051         ++_poll_libusb_refcount;
00052       }
00053     }
00054     virtual ~receiver_control_impl() {
00055       LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("~receiver_control_impl refcount=%d") % _poll_libusb_refcount));
00056       _input_queue.reset();
00057       if (--_poll_libusb_refcount == 0) {
00058         LOG_INFO("receiver_control_impl join ...");
00059         pthread_join(_poll_libusb_thread, NULL);
00060         LOG_INFO("receiver_control_impl joined");
00061         _poll_libusb_thread = 0;
00062       }
00063     }
00064 
00065     virtual void init(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config) {
00066       _rbs_map.clear();
00067       BOOST_FOREACH(const boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type& v, config) {
00068         if (v.first == "rbs") {
00069           ASSERT_THROW(boost::filesystem::exists(v.second.data()));
00070           _rbs_map[v.second.get<int>("<xmlattr>.fs")] = v.second.data();
00071         }
00072       }
00073       set_sample_rate(config.get<int>("<xmlattr>.fs"));
00074       set_center_freq_hz(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.fc"));
00075       const std::string config_presel(config.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.use_preselector"));
00076       ASSERT_THROW(config_presel == "true" || config_presel == "false");
00077       use_preselector(config_presel == "true");
00078       set_attenuator(config.get<int>("<xmlattr>.attenuator"));
00079     }
00080 
00081     virtual void set_sample_rate(int sample_rate) {
00082       ASSERT_THROW(_rbs_map.find(sample_rate) != _rbs_map.end());
00083       _sample_rate= sample_rate;
00084       _fx2_control->load_fpga(_rbs_map[sample_rate]);
00085     }
00086     virtual int get_sample_rate() const { return _sample_rate; }
00087 
00088     virtual void enable_dither(bool b) {
00089       set_sio(b, FPGA::sioctl::CMD::dither);
00090     }
00091     virtual void enable_preamp(bool b) {
00092       set_sio(b, FPGA::sioctl::CMD::gain_high);
00093     }
00094     virtual void start_async_input(callback::sptr callback) {
00095 #ifdef __APPLE
00096       const size_t queue_size(510);
00097 #else
00098       const size_t queue_size(16320);
00099 #endif        
00100       _input_queue = input_queue::make(callback, queue_size, 8,
00101                                        libusb::device_handle::get_cached_handle
00102                                        (boost::static_pointer_cast<libusb::special_handle>
00103                                         (_fx2_control->get_usb_device_handle())->get_device()), 
00104                                        fx2_control::EndPoint::data_in);
00105       set_sio(true, FPGA::sioctl::CMD::fifo_enable);
00106     }
00107     virtual void stop_async_input() {
00108       set_sio(false, FPGA::sioctl::CMD::fifo_enable);
00109       _input_queue.reset();
00110     }
00111     virtual void use_preselector(bool b) {
00112       if (_use_preselector == b) return;
00113       set_presel_id(b ? get_preselector_id(get_center_frequency_hz()) : 10);
00114       _use_preselector = b;
00115     }
00116     virtual double get_center_frequency_hz() const { 
00117       return counts2hz(_sio_ctl.freg);
00118     }
00119     virtual double set_center_freq_hz(double center_freq_hz) {
00120       ASSERT_THROW(center_freq_hz >= 0.0  && center_freq_hz < 40e6);
00121       set_presel_id(_use_preselector ? get_preselector_id(center_freq_hz) : 10);
00122       _fx2_control->fpga_sio(_sio_ctl.set_freg(hz2counts(center_freq_hz)));
00123       return get_center_frequency_hz();
00124     }
00125     virtual void set_attenuator(boost::uint8_t atten_id) {
00126       ASSERT_THROW(atten_id<4);
00127       if (atten_id == (_frontend_ctl >> 4)) return;
00128       _frontend_ctl = _fx2_control->set_port((atten_id << 4) | (_frontend_ctl & 0x0F));
00129     }
00130 
00131   private:
00132     typedef std::vector<double> filter_cutoffs;
00133     static double counts2hz(boost::uint32_t counts) {
00134       return counts/double(1ULL<<32)*80e6;
00135     }
00136     static boost::uint32_t hz2counts(double freq_hz) {
00137       return boost::uint32_t(freq_hz/80e6*double(1ULL<<32)+0.5);
00138     }
00139     static filter_cutoffs make_filter_cutoffs() {
00140       const double flt[] = {1.7e6, 2.1e6, 3.0e6, 4.2e6, 6.0e6, 8.4e6, 12e6, 17e6, 24e6, 32e6};
00141       return filter_cutoffs(flt, flt+sizeof(flt)/sizeof(double));
00142     }
00143     void set_presel_id(boost::uint8_t presel_id) {
00144       if (presel_id == (_frontend_ctl & 0x0F)) return;
00145       _frontend_ctl = _fx2_control->set_port((_frontend_ctl & 0xF0) | (presel_id & 0x0F));
00146     }
00147     boost::uint8_t get_preselector_id(double freq_hz) const {
00148       std::vector<double>::const_iterator
00149         i(std::find_if(_filter_cutoffs.begin(),
00150                        _filter_cutoffs.end(),
00151                        std::bind1st(std::less<double>(), freq_hz)));
00152       return std::distance(_filter_cutoffs.begin(), i); 
00153     }
00154     void set_sio(bool b, boost::uint8_t c) {
00155       _fx2_control->fpga_sio(_sio_ctl.set_ctl(b ? (_sio_ctl.ctl | c) : (_sio_ctl.ctl & (~c))));
00156     }
00157 
00158     static void* poll_libusb_thread_fn(void*) {
00159 #if 1
00160       int maxpri(0);
00161       if ((maxpri = sched_get_priority_max(SCHED_FIFO))>=0) {
00162         struct sched_param sparam;
00163         sparam.sched_priority = maxpri;
00164         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("setting thread priority to %d") % maxpri));
00165         if (pthread_setschedparam(_poll_libusb_thread, SCHED_FIFO, &sparam) < 0)
00166           LOG_ERROR("pthread_setschedparam");
00167       }
00168 #endif
00169       // handle libusb events until perseus_exit is called
00170       while (_poll_libusb_refcount > 0) {
00171         static struct timeval tv = { 1, 0 };
00172         libusb_handle_events_timeout(libusb::session::get_global_session()->get_context(), &tv);
00173       }
00174       LOG_INFO("poll_libusb_thread_fn: exit");
00175       return 0;
00176     }
00177 
00178     fx2_control::sptr    _fx2_control;
00179     FPGA::sioctl         _sio_ctl;
00180     boost::uint8_t       _frontend_ctl;
00181     bool                 _use_preselector;
00182     const filter_cutoffs _filter_cutoffs;
00183     input_queue::sptr    _input_queue;
00184     static pthread_t     _poll_libusb_thread;
00185     static int           _poll_libusb_refcount;
00186     rbs_map              _rbs_map;
00187     int                  _sample_rate;
00188   } ;
00189 
00190   pthread_t receiver_control_impl::_poll_libusb_thread   = 0;
00191   int       receiver_control_impl::_poll_libusb_refcount = 0;
00192 
00193   size_t receiver_control::get_num_perseus() {
00194     return usb_device_handle::get_device_list(receiver_control_impl::_vendor_id,
00195                                               receiver_control_impl::_product_id).size();
00196   }
00197 
00198   product_id receiver_control::get_product_id_at(size_t index, std::string firmware) {
00199     fx2_control::sptr fxc(fx2_control::make(receiver_control_impl::_vendor_id,
00200                                             receiver_control_impl::_product_id,
00201                                             index));
00202     return fxc->get_eeprom_pid(firmware);
00203   }
00204 
00205   receiver_control::sptr receiver_control::make(size_t index) {
00206     return receiver_control::sptr(new receiver_control_impl(index));
00207   }
00208 } // namespace Perseus
